name: Letter for help written on the background of the Afghan sky
description:
I'm Azita,
I am a 12-year-old Afghan girl who wrote my problems in this NFT to the people of the world, albeit with the help of an online translator, who I think is the first letter in the NFT to ask the people of the world for help.
I am sending this and a few other NFTs
And you, dear art friends and artists, save my life and my family by buying this NFT.
Please read my letter in this photo.
Sorry, my photo does not deserve your beautiful look, if I survive I will learn art and share the beauties of my life with you.
I ask the good people of the world to help see this letter
thanks
